// client/src/pages/HomePage.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../App.css'; // Hard-coded hotel data const hotels = [ { id: 1, name: 'Sayeman Beach Resort', location: "Kalatoli, Cox's Bazar", image: 'https://placehold.co/400x300/4CAF50/FFFFFF?text=Sayeman+Resort', amenities: ['Garden', 'Swimming Pool', 'Air Conditioning'], rating: '5 Star', discount: '40% off', price: 'BDT 5,858', roomsRemaining: 5, promoText: 'Extra 5% discount for bKash payment.', isCoupleFriendly: false, isAccessible: false, }, { id: 2, name: 'Sea Pearl Beach Resort & Spa', location: "Inani, Cox's Bazar", image: 'https://placehold.co/400x300/2196F3/FFFFFF?text=Sea+Pearl', amenities: ['Couple Friendly', 'Accessible', 'Air Conditioning'], rating: '5 Star', discount: '30% off', price: 'BDT 7,200', roomsRemaining: 2, promoText: 'Extra 5% discount for bKash payment.', isCoupleFriendly: true, isAccessible: true, }, { id: 3, name: 'Long Beach Hotel Cox\'s Bazar', location: "Koliatoli, Cox's Bazar", image: 'https://placehold.co/400x300/FF5722/FFFFFF?text=Long+Beach+Hotel', amenities: ['Restaurant', 'Spa', 'Pool'], rating: '4 Star', discount: '15% off', price: 'BDT 6,500', roomsRemaining: 10, promoText: 'Complimentary breakfast.', isCoupleFriendly: true, isAccessible: true, }, { id: 4, name: 'Hotel The Cox Today', location: "Main Road, Cox's Bazar", image: 'https://placehold.co/400x300/FFC107/FFFFFF?text=The+Cox+Today', amenities: ['Rooftop Pool', 'Fitness Center', 'Conference Hall'], rating: '5 Star', discount: '25% off', price: 'BDT 8,100', roomsRemaining: 3, promoText: 'Free airport shuttle.', isCoupleFriendly: true, isAccessible: true, }, { id: 5, name: 'Hotel Ocean Paradise', location: "Koliatoli, Cox's Bazar", image: 'https://placehold.co/400x300/00bfff/FFFFFF?text=Ocean+Paradise', amenities: ['Spa', 'Restaurant', 'Gym'], rating: '3 Star', discount: '10% off', price: 'BDT 4,500', roomsRemaining: 8, promoText: 'Special weekend package.', isCoupleFriendly: true, isAccessible: false, }, { id: 6, name: 'Neelima Beach Resort', location: "Himchori, Cox's Bazar", image: 'https://placehold.co/400x300/20c997/FFFFFF?text=Neelima+Resort', amenities: ['Garden', 'Beach Access', 'Restaurant'], rating: '3 Star', discount: '12% off', price: 'BDT 4,200', roomsRemaining: 6, promoText: 'Book three nights, get one free.', isCoupleFriendly: true, isAccessible: false, }, ]; const HomePage = () => { // State to hold which filters are active const [selectedFilters, setSelectedFilters] = useState({ '3 Star': false, '4 Star': false, '5 Star': false, }); // Handle filter checkbox changes const handleFilterChange = (event) => { const { id, checked } = event.target; setSelectedFilters(prevFilters => ({ ...prevFilters, [id]: checked, })); }; // Filter the hotels based on the selected filters const filteredHotels = hotels.filter(hotel => { // If no filters are selected, show all hotels if (!Object.values(selectedFilters).some(value => value)) { return true; } // Check if the hotel's rating matches any of the selected filters return selectedFilters[hotel.rating]; }); return (
{/* Navigation Bar */}
StayHotel
Flight Hotel Tour Visa Gift Card
{/* Hero Section with Vibrant Background */}

Your Perfect Getaway Awaits!

Discover amazing hotels and experiences around the world.

{/* Search Bar Section */}
{/* Content Section (Rooms List) */}

Filters

{filteredHotels.length} properties found

{filteredHotels.length > 0 ? ( filteredHotels.map(hotel => (

{hotel.name}

{hotel.rating} | {hotel.location}

{hotel.roomsRemaining <= 5 && (

{hotel.roomsRemaining} Rooms Remaining

)}
{hotel.amenities.map(amenity => ( {amenity} ))}

{hotel.discount}

{hotel.promoText}

Starts from

{hotel.price} / night, per room

)) ) : (

No hotels found matching your filter criteria.

)}
); }; export default HomePage;
